alert.note: Alert for Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 21 at 5:47PM CDT until September 21 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster County in south central Nebraska... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Red Cloud, or 35 miles south of Hastings, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Cowles around 600 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
